          <title>
            <string language="en">Emphysema</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Emphysem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Emphysème</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Emphysema</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Enfisema</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εμφύσημα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Enfisema</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a comparative appearance of alveoli from a normal person and from a person suffering from emphysema.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">breathing problem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">emphysema</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lungs</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt ein vergleichbares Aussehen
der Alveolen von einer normalen Person und von einer Person, die unter
Emphysem leidet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un aspect comparatif 
des alvéoles d'une personne normale et d'une personne souffrant de 
l'emphysème.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma aparência 
comparativa dos alveoli de uma pessoa normal e de uma pessoa que sofre
do emphysema.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un'apparenza 
comparativa degli alveoli da una persona normale e da una persona che 
soffre dall'enfisema.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει συγκριτική εμφάνιση των 
φατνίων από ένα κανονικό πρόσωπο και από ένα πρόσωπο που 
πάσχει από το εμφύσημα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un aspecto comparativo 
de alvéolos de una persona normal y de una persona que sufre de 
enfisema.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">atmenproblem</string>
          </keyword>
